content:
Tauman family

1 Leibel TAUMAN                      1773-76 - 1830 #364
 + Freidel HAUTMACHER?               1782-88 (Salomon)

  2o Ester TAUMAN                    Nov 8, 1810 #65 - 1846 #375
    * Leibel KOHLBERG                1793-97 - Feb 2, 1869 #48
        FAMILY LISTING
  2o Dine TAUMAN                     1813 #107 - after 1890
    * Abraham SCHONTHAL              1818 #300 - after 1890
          married Oct 20, 1842 (1876 #42)
        FAMILY LISTING
  2o Pessel TAUMAN                   1819 #20
  2o Gelle TAUMAN                    1821 #322
  2x Mayer Zelig TAUMAN              1824 #267 - 1825 #50
  2x Eysyk TAUMAN                    1827 #51 - Sep 2, 1873 #751
    + Nachy FASTER                   1831 - Jan 17, 1878 #27

       * Lewis WALDMAN               1865-67 Austria
             married Aug 30, 1896 #13369 Manhattan NY

          * Martin MENSCH            Apr 18, 1895 NY - Oct 19, 1986 Queens NY
                married 1917-20
           5x Max R MENSCH           Sep 27, 1920 NY
           5x Charles S MENSCH       Oct 25, 1923 NY - May 24, 2013 NY
           5x Ralph MENSCH           1925-26 NY
        4x Isaac (Irving) WALDMAN    Feb 13, 1901 #7830 Manhattan NY

  2x Effroim TAUMAN                  - 1833 #130
